alert.note: Alert for Glasscock; Howard; Martin; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 11:40PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Glasscock, northeastern Midland, southwestern Howard and southeastern Martin Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Lomax, or 11 miles east of Greenwood, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Garden City, Greenwood, Stanton, Lomax and Spraberry. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 147 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
